item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
Government of Canada Names Thousand Islands National Park
MALLORYTOWN, ONTARIO--(Marketwire - March 28, 2013) - Today, on behalf of the Honourable Peter Kent, Canada's Environment Minister and Minister responsible for Parks Canada, Mr. Gord Brown, Member of Parliament for Leeds-Grenville, officially unveiled Thousand Islands ... "The name Thousand Islands National Park will help this national park renew its place in the consciousness of Canadians and inspire future generations to continue support for this long established protected treasure," said MP Brown.

item.description:
Byron Wins Five At Kawartha Downs
He edged by Gord Brown (23 wins) and Brad Rae (21 wins) for the top spot. The Cambridge, Ont. reinsman has won 43 races so far this year and 1,033 lifetime. To view Saturday's harness racing results, click on the following link: Saturday Results - Kawartha ...
